articles.author: Rohail Saleem
articles.title: Justin Bieber Gives Apple UX Advice, Threatens A “Rear Naked Choke Hold” - Wccftech
articles.description: Apple's Messages app UX has irritated Justin Bieber so much so that he is threatening to place everyone at Apple in a rear naked choke hold.
articles.content: Apple's Messages app UX has apparently irritated Justin Bieber, the one-time teen heartthrob and an accomplished singer, to such an extent that he is now threatening to place everyone at Apple in a "… [+1905 chars]
